title: NOTICEBOARD Sigmund – a European database of mental health surveys
abstract: With the support of the European Union Biomed programme, a database is being assembled on all known health surveys and general population epidemiological studies in Europe that have a mental health component. This database may be consulted free of charge. Workers who have conducted, or are conducting, relevant studies are invited to send information to be incorporated in the database. The contact person is: Catherine Polge, Equipe ‘Vieillissement cognitif’, CRLS, Val d'Aurelle, F 34298 Montpellier Cedex 5, France. Tel 33 04 67 61 30 28. E-mail: catherine.polge@dicdoc.inserm.fr.
